attributes.action: Keep adult colouring books VAT free
attributes.additional_details:
my website www.adultcolouring.com was launched in february 2016
my email address is contactus@adultcolouring.com

BBC article http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/entertainment-arts-36357986
attributes.background: HMRC want to tax adult colouring books meaning the prices will go up by 20%. As an adult colouring book specialst this will ruin my small business. They also want to charge VAT retrospectively on my last 12 mths sales. Most books are free from VAT, why should adult colouring books be any different?
